0. IsExternalURL{"registry-package"} -> {false}
1. ListPackages{"registry-package"} -> {<iter.Seq2[github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/common/apitype.PackageMetadata,error]>}
2. DownloadPlugin{PluginSpec{Name:"registry-package", Kind:"resource", Version:Version{Major:1}, PluginDownloadURL:"https://registry.example.com/registry-package-1.0.0.tar.gz"}} -> {"/tmp/plugins/resource-registry-package-v1.0.0", <func(bool)>, nil}
3. DetectPluginPathAt{"/tmp/plugins/resource-registry-package-v1.0.0"} -> {"/tmp/plugins/resource-registry-package-v1.0.0/PulumiPlugin.yaml", nil}
4. LoadPluginProject{"/tmp/plugins/resource-registry-package-v1.0.0/PulumiPlugin.yaml"} -> {PluginProject{Runtime:ProjectRuntimeInfo{name:"go"}}, nil}
5. InstallPluginAt{"/tmp/plugins/resource-registry-package-v1.0.0", PluginProject{Runtime:ProjectRuntimeInfo{name:"go"}}} -> {nil}
6. MarkInstallationDone{PluginSpec{Name:"registry-package", Kind:"resource", Version:Version{Major:1}, PluginDownloadURL:"https://registry.example.com/registry-package-1.0.0.tar.gz"}, true}
7. RunPackage{"/plugin/launch/dir", "/tmp/plugins/resource-registry-package-v1.0.0", nil} -> {nil, nil}
